description:
River gauges: See the gauge formula for Rosewood_Canyon. Sassafrass has no hazards at <345 ML/d.

In lower/moderate flows, R4 and R5 do not have aquatic hazards and R5 bolts are well clear of the water.

Approach

Park at Never Never Picnic Area. Take the Sassafrass Creek tourist track from behind the picnic shelter, and follow it beyond the signposted junction with Rosewood track. Follow the track down the switchbacks to the signposted crossing of Sassafras Creek, with the first abseil cascading down to the left.

Descent

Sassafras
Rap L/R M Description
For R1 on thick gumtree: It is essential that no permanent anchor material is left, due to R1 starting ON the tourist track. Recommended method is to leave a long piece of webbing and a tightened quicklink. This can be recovered on the walk out.
R1 Tree CM/R 35m In flow, into shallow.
R2 Tree CR 60m In flow, into shallow. Stepped waterfall sequence, 3x cascades, shallow pools inbetween.
DC CR 10m Or abseil from trees CL.
R3 XX CM/L 25m In flow into deep (turbulent, eddy at base).
Stem slot CL (DANGER Spillover) to access R4 anchors. Or climb out of pool CR, traverse back towards slot CL and DC 2m to R4 bolts.
R4 XX CR 65m In flow into shallow. DANGER strainer hazard, turbulent water.
R5 XX CM 18m In flow into deep. HYDRAULIC!!! Bolts under waterfall in flow, really needs high water bolts. Plenty of other options available, recommend CL.
10m DC traversing large ramp L-R
R6A XX CL 30m In flow into shallow with slide finish.  !!! Last abseiler, flick pull side over bulge CR and throw to base to minimise pulldown friction around the corner. Alternatively, scramble up exit scree slope CL to retrieve rope.
R6B Tree CR 25m Dry.

Exit

Climb very loose scree slope directly CL of final abseil. WATCH OUT FOR STINGING TREES! Scramble up to gain the ridgeline, ensuring you don't turn uphill too soon due to extremely chossy cliff bands close to the canyon. Ascend the ridge until meeting the Sassafrass tourist track. Leaving bags on the track, follow the switchbacks downhill to retrieve R1 anchor material. Then reverse the Sassafrass track back to the Never Never Picnic Area, and the parked car.

Red tape
